title: Impact of chlorine and UV/H2O2 on microplastics in drinking water
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00618F, Paper
Hannah Groenewegen, Husein Almuhtaram, Robert C. Andrews
Limited studies to-date have assessed the impacts of disinfectants (chlorine and ultraviolet (UV)/H2O2) on microplastics (MPs), with most employing dosages and fluences that are much higher than typically applied during drinking water treatment.
